name: Demon Grade VR
description:
Demon Grade is a VR FPS featuring free 360 degree movement, with no jogging in place, no teleporting, and no rails. In Demon Grade, you will explore dynamically generated levels in first person perspective while fighting relentless demonic enemies and collecting their demon shards to unlock various weapons. Move, Shoot, and Survive in Demon Grade VR... if you can.

Dynamically generated Levels
4 Weapons to unlock ( 5 in total )
New nausea-free locomotion
Free 360 Movement with just the tilt of your head
MOVE, SHOOT, SURVIVE today!
